p: The cytotoxicity assay revealed that five of the seven hits showed 50% cytotoxicity (50% cell cytotoxicity, CC 50) at concentrations higher than 300 μM. The CC 50 values of compounds NSC87511, CID5318214, CID3821945, CID5748691, and CID5373747 were higher than their IC 50 values ( Supplementary Table 1). Generally, if the IC 50 of a compound is less than the CC 50, the compound can effectively inhibit the virus without exhibiting significant cell toxicity.
